p: Regarding the antioxidant activity, Elfalleh and coworkers [ 41] reported a half maximal effective concentration (EC 50) value of 11.48 Î¼g/mL for an aqueous pomegranate peel extract in agreement with our results, which proved that the choice of the aqueous extraction method is characterized by being simple and economical; therefore, it is preferred in various biological applications, especially in the pharmaceutical and food industries. On the other hand, Nagappan [ 42] reported that any plant species showing promising bioactivity in an aqueous extract is considered as a valuable health resource for poor communities.
